attributes.action: Allowing Eid to be marked as an official public holiday
attributes.additional_details:
As UK is a multi-faith society, it should allow other faiths such as Islam to have a public holiday for Eid.

Allowing Muslims to have their own public holiday for Eid, will create social awareness from all faiths.

By creating a public holiday for Eid, we hope to achieve social solidarity and build a better community where all faiths collaborate.
